approved_story_facts: Coach Gadolinium repeatedly pushes athletes through exhausting drills.
Two tech officials record outcomes and repeatedly mark failures before one pass.
The Gymnast initially appears to pass and trigger relief in the room.
Officials announce a sudden doping disqualification and trigger a red alert.
The sequence hard-cuts into an MRI room with a waking patient.
The Doctor confirms early tumor detection thanks to contrast MRI.
revision_notes: Keep performance pressure visual and clinical, not melodramatic.
Maintain contrast between discipline scenes and MRI reveal.
Preserve the protective-system theme in final beat.
